name: Murder Ball
description:
Murder Ball is a rhythm based reaction game originally intended to be a movement based exergame using the Kinect. 

Controls - Q W E R  (Hit the key as the shape is shrinking (blue) a red effect will signify a missed beat and a green beat will signify a correct beat) Press the red button on the TV (Above purple) start not the screen! and don't press space i forgot i left it in for debugging purposes.

Gameplay - Hit the corresponding key to the beat (before the shape fully shrinks) - I.e Hit Q as the most left ball is shrinking.  Matching 3 beats in a row on one character will result in that character throwing a ball randomly at the skeleton kings team and rewarding one life to the unit that throws it .  Missing a beat will rest the streak on that  character.If the player defeats the skeletons kings team before the song runs out they will enter a horde mode in which they will be rewarded based on their performance.   

Every time the song finishes and the player still has units alive on the team the level will reset and the song speed will increase - the goal of the game is to survive for as long as possible.

Royalty free music used

2D art created by me 

3D assets by Bitgem

Animations from Mixamo
